casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut ex rel. Raymond CONNORS, Chief Animal Control Officer
v.
TWO HORSES et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 15, 2016.

Lisa-Lotte E. Lind-Larsen, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Scott N. Koschwitz, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The petition by the defendant Lisa-Lotte E. Lind-Larsen for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 37594) is denied.
